mapper.insert: INSERT INTO block (title, description, file_url, thumbnail_url, duration, price, category_id, uploader_id, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{fileUrl}, #{thumbnailUrl}, #{duration}, #{price}, #{categoryId}, #{uploaderId}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, c.id as cat_id, c.name as cat_name, c.color as cat_color, c.icon as cat_icon, u.nickname as uploader_nickname FROM block b LEFT JOIN sound_category c ON b.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users u ON b.uploader_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id} AND b.is_active = true
mapper.update: UPDATE block SET play_count = play_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE block SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, file_url = #{fileUrl}, thumbnail_url = #{thumbnailUrl}, duration = #{duration}, price = #{price}, category_id = #{categoryId}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
